page.title: 20SANDY PAST AND PRESENT.
page.content: SANDY WAS MENTIONED IN THE ORIGINAL DOMESDAY BOOK BEING SPELT SANDEIE.WHEN COLLECTING INFORMATION FOR THE DOMESDAY PROJECT WE DISCOVERED THAT MANY OF THE STREET NAMES REFLECT SANDY'S HISTORY. OVER THE YEARS LIFE HAS OBVIOUSLY CHANGED IN SANDY.THE SIZE OF THE TOWN HAS INCREASED WITH THE MODERN HOUSING ESTATES,AND THE AREA OF LIGHT INDUSTIES IN SUNDERLAND ROAD.HOWEVER THE FRIENDLINESS OF THE INHABITANTS OF SANDY REMAINS THE SAME. THE CHILDREN OF ST.SWITHUN'S LOWER SCHOOL WISH TO THANK THE PEOPLE OF SANDY FOR THEIR PATIENCE AND HELP IN OUR INVESTIGATIONS FOR THE PROJECT.
